avalancheActivity.comment: A few small avalanches released in the area last week.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Wet avalanches may release with thaw on Wednesday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Most of the snowpack melted last week. Another thaw is forecasted on Wednesday and Thursday, and then wet avalanches become likely.

travelAdvisory.comment: The snow melted rapidly during the weekend and became isothermal and stable most places. Now it has been snowing a little bit many places in SW-winds but mostly in the Westfjords, there it snowed yeasterday in strong NW- and later W-winds, before it turned to SW
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snow melted rapidly during the weekend and became isothermal and stable most places. Now it has been snowing a little bit many places in SW-winds

weatherForecast.highlights: Hlýnar, hvöss S-SV átt með mikilli rigningu á miðvikudag og fimmtudag. Minni vindur og kólnandi á föstudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: A small sluff fell by the road on Súðavíkuhlíð on Monday night (3 or 4) February.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New unstable wind slabs have formed in snowfall and snowdrift especially in N to NE slopes. Wet avalanches may release with thaw on Wednesday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snowfall and snowdrift have formed new unstable wind slabs on top of the stable snow especially in N-NE slopes. More snow is likely to accumulate on the same slopes and gullies due to considerable snow and strong S-SW winds in the coming days.  Another thaw is forecasted on Wednesday, and then wet avalanches become likely.

travelAdvisory.comment: The snow melted rapidly during the weekend and became isothermal and stable most places. Now it has been snowing a little bit many places in SW-winds but mostly in the Westfjords, there it snowed yeasterday in strong NW- and later W-winds, before it turned to SW
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snow melted rapidly during the weekend and became isothermal and stable most places. Now it has been snowing a little bit many places in SW-winds

weatherForecast.highlights: Hvöss S-SV átt með rigningu, slydduog snjókomu á miðvikudag. Hægari og snjókoma á fimmtudagsmorgun, hvöss SV-átt um kvöldið. Hægur og lítilsháttar snjókoma á föstudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: A wet slab in Burstabrekkudalur on Friday and some wet-loose on Saturday
avalancheActivity.highlights: A significant amount of snow has melted due to thawing and strong winds on Friday and Saturday.  Wind slabs are forming in light snow showers in SW-winds

snowpackStructure.highlights: A significant amount of snow has melted due to warm and strong winds on Friday and Saturday. Temperatures have reached close to 10°C at mountain elevations, and the snowpack is expected to have become isothermal most places an rather stable. On Monday it startet snowing a little bit in strong SW-winds

travelAdvisory.comment: The snow melted rapidly during the weekend and became isothermal and stable most places. Now it has been snowing a little bit many places in SW-winds but mostly in the Westfjords, there it snowed yeasterday in strong NW- and later W-winds, before it turned to SW
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snow melted rapidly during the weekend and became isothermal and stable most places. Now it has been snowing a little bit many places in SW-winds

weatherForecast.highlights: SV-læg átt með éljum fram á miðvikud. en hvessir hressilega síðdegis og hlýnar með talsverðri úrkomu. Bloti í byggð en snjóar til fjalla

avalancheActivity.comment: Wet avalanches released in the mountains during the rapid melting on Friday and Saturday. Slush flows released onto roads in southern East fjords.
avalancheActivity.highlights: A significant amount of snow has melted due to warm temperatures and rain on Friday and Saturday. Thin wind slabs may form before next rain weather on Wednesday evening

snowpackStructure.highlights: A significant amount of snow has melted due to warm temperatures and rain on Friday and Saturday and again on Sunday-Monday. After strong melting the snow pack is expected to be isothermal and stable. Thin wind slabs may form during S-winds before next rain weather on Wednesday evening

travelAdvisory.comment: The snow melted rapidly during the weekend and became isothermal and stable most places. Now it has been snowing a little bit many places in SW-winds but mostly in the Westfjords, there it snowed yeasterday in strong NW- and later W-winds, before it turned to SW
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snow melted rapidly during the weekend and became isothermal and stable most places. Now it has been snowing a little bit many places in SW-winds

weatherForecast.highlights: S-læg átt með éljum á miðvikudag áður en hvessir með asahláku um kvöldið
